scanSessionWillBeRestoredDialogMessage:
The scan sessions will be restored also on the server when it will be connected.

To trigger the Keyboard Emulation and the CSV output, use the Sync button inside the scan session page.
scanSessionDeleteDialogMessage: The scan sessions will be deleted permanetly
scansOnSpreadsheetHelp: How do i put the scans on my spreadsheet (or other software)?
scansOnSpreadsheetHelpStep2: Install and start the server on your computer
scansOnSpreadsheetHelpStep3: Open the Select server page from the app menu and choose your computer from the list
scansOnSpreadsheetHelpStep4: Once the app is connected open your spreadsheet or another software of your choice in which you want to scan in, and position the cursor wherever you want to scan
scansOnSpreadsheetHelpStep5: Scan your barcodes by tapping the camera icon on the main page of the app
cursorPositionHelpOutro: the barcodes will be typed in the cursor position
firstTimeConnectHelp: If it's the first time that you connect the app to the server your firewall or your antivirus may block the server, consult the
sendBarcodeAgainHelpIntro: Use this button to send and type the barcodes of the current scan session again.
sendBarcodeAgainHelpOutro: You can also use this button to send to your computer the barcodes that you've scanned offline.
editCurrentScanSessionButtonText: This button opens a page to edit the current scan session details
receivedBarcodeOnceHelp: This icon means that the computer has received and typed (if enabled) the barcode at least one time since it has been scanned.
noReceivedBarcodeHelp: This icon means that the computer hasn't received the barcode yet.
receivedBarcodeOnceHelpDetail: This can happen when you scan a barcode while your smartphone isn't connected.
offlineServersIconHelp: This icon is shown next to the offline servers
onlineServersIconHelp: This icon is shown next to the online servers
connectedServersIconHelp: This icon is shown next to the server connected with the app
seekHelpOutro: If you're still unable to fix your problem, or for other enquiries contact
tapATextSpan: Tap a text to insert it
noTextFoundDialogMessage: Cannot find any text on the captured image
allowOutputTemplateSelection: Show the Output Template selection page
rateBarcodeToPcDialogMessage: Let other users know what you achieved with {{ appName }}
reconnectDialogMessage: It seems that the computer {{ defaultServerName}} changed ip address from {{defaultServerAddress}} to {{discoveryServerAddress }}, do you want to reconnect?
scanSessionDialogMessage:
The scan session {{ scanSessionName }} will be permanently deleted.

If instead you want to keep it on the smartphone, use the archive button.
scanSessionPermanentDeleteDialogMessage:
The scan session will be permanently deleted.

If instead you want to keep it on the smartphone, use the archive button.
clickToStartScan: Click on the camera button to start scanning
switchOnlineMode: To find servers switch to the Online mode
cantFindServerDialogMessage:
Make you sure that the server is running on your computer.

If you're still unable to connect do the following:
  • Add {{ serverProgramName }} to Windows Firewall exceptions
  • Try to temporarily disable your antivirus
disableKeyboarAutofocusDescription: The system keyboard won't open automatically. A manual tap on the input field will be required
pdaIntentsDescription: Receive barcode scan data using Android intent actions. To subscribe to multiple actions, delimit them with commas. Ensure that the 'Intent action' option is turned on in the system scanner settings
continiousModeTimeoutDescription: Time to wait before opening the camera when using Continuous mode
repeatIntervaDescription: Time to wait between a scan and another when syncing a session using the Sync button (up-right side)
moreOutputTemplate: If you have multiple Output Templates it'll let you pick one before scanning
useFollowingVariables: You can use the following variables (lowercase):
useDefaultScanSessionNameLabel: Always use the default Scan session name
createNewScanSessionChoiceItem: If enabled, you won't be asked to choose a name when creating a new scan session
acquireScansessionAsBarcodeLabel: Acquire the Scan session name as barcode
openAppScanModeLabel: Open the app in Scan mode
limitBarcodeFormatsDescription: Use this setting to keep enabled only the barcode formats that you scan. It may improve the scanning speed and the overall reliability
duplicateBarcodeLabel1: Discard adjacent: will detect the sequence A, B, A as not duplicate, and X, Y, Y as duplicate
duplicateBarcodeLabel2: Discard Scan Session: will check if the barcode is present in the entire scan session
scanSessionFilterExample: For example, if you want to accept only a name that looks like this AB-1234 use the following regex:
enableRealtimeSendDescription: If disabled, the app won't send the scans immediately. You can use the Sync button to send the scans to the server. This can be useful when you want to collect barcodes and send them later
enableNFCDescription: We're currently supporting NDEF text tags only. Please contact us for other formats
alsoInvertedDescription: If enabled, the app will try to scan inverted barcodes too (white on black)
skipWifiCheckDescription: Useful when the app is connected using 4G / 5G mobile data instead of Wi-Fi
barcodeToPcRemoteDescription3: Let's connect to the PC and turn your smartphone into a real barcode scanner.
connectToServerDescription: Scan the QR Code shown in the server program
connectionTakingTooLongDialogTitle: The connection is taking too long
connectionTakingTooLongDialogMessage: Your firewall/antivirus may keep the app from connecting, would you like to see the instructions to configure your computer?
beepSoundDialogMessage:
If you want to hear a beep sound after the scan, raise your Media volume and also make you sure that the Do not disturb mode is disabled.

If you want to customize the beep sound, please use the BEEP component in the server settings.

If instead you want to put a delay between the scans you can set a timeout in the Settings page
alreadyReceivedScanDialogTitle: The server has already received this scan
alreadyReceivedScanDialogMessage: Do you want to send it again?
scanDeleteOnlySmartphoneDialogMessage: The scan will be deleted only from the smartphone.
actionOnlyOnlineDialogMessage: Please connect the app to the computer
exportErrorDialogMessage: Cannot export the file. Please make you sure that there is enough space. If the error persists, please report the issue at {{ config.email_support }}, including a sample barcode that you are currently scanning.
nfcDisabledDialogMessage: The NFC Scan feature is disabled. Do you want to enable it now?
nfcDisabledSuccessDialogMessage: The NFC Scanning has been enabled successfully. Please tap the red camera button and then the NFC button again in order to apply the settings.
nfcAndroidInstructionMessage: To scan a NFC tag just approach it with your smartphone. If it isn't working make sure it's enabled from both the app settings and your smartphone system settings.
settingsUpdatedDialogMessage: The server settings have been updated. To apply the changes also to the app side tap on the camera button.
remoteComponentDialogMessage:
Cannot execute the {{ outputBlockType }} component.

Please make sure that the smartphone is connected to the server
addMoreDialogMessage: Do you want to add another item to this scan session?
preventInfiniteLoopDialogMessage: Perhaps you forgot to put the BARCODE component, or you have a condition that is always false. Check your Output template. Do you want to continue?
isPDADeviceDialogMessage: If your device has an integrated barcode scanner, please use the MANUAL INPUT mode, and enable the [CR][LF] suffix.
isPDADeviceDialogMessage2: It appears that your {{ brand }} device is equipped with an integrated laser scanner. Would you like to optimize the app to use it?
evalCodeDialogMessage: An error occurred while executing your Output template: {{ error }}
qrBillDialogMessage: It seems that you are scanning a QR Bill. Please follow the instructions to get the correct output.
connectionProblemDialogMessage: To determine the cause check the help page
askWifiEnableIfDisableDialogMessage: Please connect your smartphone to a Wi-Fi network (or ethernet)
showVersionMisMatchDialogMessage:
Please update both app and server, otherwise they may not work properly.

Server can be downloaded at {{ websiteName }}
unableToConnectToastTitle: Unable to connect. Select Help from the app menu in order to determine the cause
saveAsDefaultChoiceDialogMessage:
Do you want to make this the default choice for future duplicate barcodes?

You'll be able to change this option from the app settings.
duplicatedBarcodesDialogMessage:
A duplicated barcode sequence has been detected.

Do you want to accept the second barcode?
